name: Healthyfied Salt and Pepper Pork
description: Dive into a healthier version of a classic with our Healthyfied Salt and Pepper Pork. Perfect for those following low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diets, this recipe ensures you don't have to compromise on flavor to keep things on the healthier side. Ideal for anyone looking to enjoy delicious, health-conscious recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Start by slicing the pork tenderloin into thin strips.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Finely mince the garlic and chop the green onions, setting them aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the salt and ground black pepper together.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Season the pork tenderloin strips with the salt and pepper mixture, ensuring they're evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the extra virgin olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Once the oil is hot, add the minced garlic to the pan and saut√© for about 2 minutes, until fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the seasoned pork strips to the pan, and cook for 8-10 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through and slightly golden on the outside, stirring occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Finally, garnish the pork with the chopped green onions before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
